trends: There has been one other sighting in North Adams
There were no other sightings in North Adams on or around October 8th 2011
Summary: because i work with aircraft mostly beechcraft king airs i thought at first it was aplane about that size but it appeared to be to lit up thought maybe it was plane on fire
divs: Sighting Details iwas driving my car glancing at the horizon as i drove down mountain road as there was still pink sky on the western horizon. then i noticed the light from object in the sky. when i looked a secound time i thought if its an airplane then there must be fire onboard as to much light was making it impossible to see what exzactly it was. i pulled over where i had unobstructed view. realizing local runway was directly west of object. but then it kind of slowly moved back and forth very little then slowly travelled east then slightly ascended at easterly angle then travelled straight up to outerspace and dissapeared. whole event probly lasted six minutes or so .we took pics with digital camera but pics are very poor unusual for this camera
